name: Dynafit TLT Speedfit Ski Boots - Unisex
description: Touring and on piste performance from the same boot. The TLT Speedfit is a versatile boot for skiers who want to go everywhere. With 60 degrees of motion in walk mode, you move naturally and comfortably on skin track and ascents. You'll lose no time to transitions, as a single buckle locks the boot in ski mode while creating a perfect snug fit. The boot nose design promotes efficiency on hut tours and backcountry missions.Grilamid shell construction offers stability and rigidity without weight.Internal Grilamid spoiler stiffens boot while keeping the boot sleek on the outside.2 micro-adjust ratchet buckles with Ultra Lock strap for secure and comfortable closure.Custom Light liner sculpts to your foot, can be heat moulded, and insulates with closed cell foam on the sole.Flex Tongue Design flexes in walk mode, but supports in ski mode.Ultra Lock 2.0 closes boot and moves to ski mode in one closure.Speed nose design increases pivot efficiency when climbing.Compatible with tech bindings.Formula Pomoca outsole grips well on mud, snow, and ice.
